about_the_game:
Before The Four Alices and it’s remake Lorange Journey were written, there was a One-Shot.
A One-Short with, not four, but three Ali- Emilie.
They are all Caucasian and non-autistic.
This is intriguing, isn’t it? So, let’s not waste time.
This DLC offers you "3 Emilie", a better version of this One-Shot, with three Endings!
detailed_description:
Before The Four Alices and it’s remake Lorange Journey were written, there was a One-Shot.
A One-Short with, not four, but three Ali- Emilie.
They are all Caucasian and non-autistic.
This is intriguing, isn’t it? So, let’s not waste time.
This DLC offers you "3 Emilie", a better version of this One-Shot, with three Endings!
name: 3 Emilie (Lorange Journey DLC)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above (x64 ONLY)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 280 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A One-Shot with 3 Emilie and several endings.
